video.title: Street Food
video.synopsis: Host Ishai Golan takes us on a culinary tour around the world, sampling dishes from food stalls, markets and favorite local restaurants.

episodes.synopsis: In Istanbul, Ishai meets the famous chef and historian Vedat Basran at the Kadiköy market and tries the famous Sultans' breakfast.
episodes.title: Istanbul

episodes.synopsis: Ishai spends 24 hours in Mumbai, where he visits the famous Crawford Market, learns how to make chai and tastes the city's best chicken tikka.
episodes.title: Mumbai

episodes.synopsis: In the Israeli city of Haifa, Ishai meets celebrated chef Israel Aharoni and learns how to make burekas, one of the nation's favorite snack foods.
episodes.title: Haifa

episodes.synopsis: Cuisine is an art form in Paris, where Ishai learns how to make a baguette and meets famous food critic Jill Podlovski.
episodes.title: Paris

episodes.synopsis: In the sweltering city of Bangkok, Ishai tries to break his own record for eating spicy dishes and visits a grasshopper food stall.
episodes.title: Bangkok

episodes.synopsis: Ishai tries to find his own sense of balance while sampling pho and snake liquor in Hanoi, a city that emphasizes harmony and equilibrium.
episodes.title: Hanoi

episodes.synopsis: In Marrakech, Ishai learns about the health benefits of Morocco's many spices and gets a taste of something sweet making cookies.
episodes.title: Marrakech

episodes.synopsis: Ishai samples the freedom and flavor of Amsterdam, selling stroopwafels at a local market and learning how to make a herring sandwich.
episodes.title: Amsterdam

episodes.synopsis: Ishai samples Napoli's many delights, including delicious baked goods, authentic Italian ice cream and pasta made by a Michelin-starred chef.
episodes.title: Napoli

episodes.synopsis: Ishai visits Georgia's capital city of Tbilisi, where he learns how to make khinkali, tasty dumplings filled with meat, spices and other delights.
episodes.title: Tbilisi

episodes.synopsis: Ishai strolls through the holiday markets of Vienna and stops at the city's first sausage stand while visiting Austria at Christmastime.
episodes.title: Vienna

episodes.synopsis: Home to half a million street food vendors, Mexico City serves up spicy, colorful cuisine influenced by both Spanish and indigenous cultures.
episodes.title: Mexico City

episodes.synopsis: After a whirlwind tour of the world's cuisine, Ishai reflects on his culinary adventures, recalling his favorite dishes and experiences.
episodes.title: Best Of..

episodes.synopsis: Ishai starts his day in the beautiful coastal city with Brazilian coffee, then tries acarajé, cassava, acai berry drink and bacon-flavored popcorn.
episodes.title: Rio de Janeiro

episodes.synopsis: In the city considered the cradle of Western civilization, Ishai samples Greek yogurt and souvlaki, and practices his classical acting skills.
episodes.title: Athens

episodes.synopsis: Ishai starts his Big Apple adventure with a doughnut in Times Square, explores the Hudson Square food truck scene and makes a proper cheesecake.
episodes.title: New York Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Ishai meets with chef Rocco DiSpirito on the Lower East Side and samples some chocolate-covered bacon, then returns to Times Square for a hot dog.
episodes.title: New York Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In the Peruvian capital, Ishai breakfasts on pan con chicharrón (pork sandwich with sweet potatoes and chili), then discovers more local dishes.
episodes.title: Lima

episodes.synopsis: Ishai discovers that the Israeli city of Ramla is home to such culinary treasures as the poached egg dish shakshuka and delicious hummus.
episodes.title: Ramla

episodes.synopsis: Ishai discovers a culinary renaissance in Prague, as food in the Czech capital moves beyond the traditional fare of potatoes, cabbage, bread and pork.
episodes.title: Prague

episodes.synopsis: In the capital of Sicily, Ishai samples local olive oil, tomatoes and cheese, and discovers why Italians refer to Palermo as the "Picnic Basket City."
episodes.title: Palermo

episodes.synopsis: Vegetables rule the dishes of the South Korean capital, where Ishai finds a healthy cuisine of vegetables roasted and sautéed in their own juices.
episodes.title: Seoul

episodes.synopsis: Ishai discovers the rich culinary history of the densely populated Philippines capital, with flavors of China, Polynesia, Spain and more.
episodes.title: Manila

episodes.synopsis: In France's largest city, Ishai samples the cuisine of the sun-drenched port, Provencal fare that is lighter than traditional French cooking.
episodes.title: Marseille

episodes.synopsis: Visiting the largest Arab city in Israel, Ishai finds an ancient culture with dishes influenced by neighboring countries such as Syria and Lebanon.
episodes.title: Nazareth

episodes.synopsis: In this Season 2 "best of" compilation, Ishai learns about the breads of Prague, makes ceviche in Lima and samples the Greek salad of Athens.
episodes.title: Best of....
